comment.author: 70251312@N00
comment._content: Dr. Lauro Muller was the Brazilian Secretary of State for Foreign Affairs.

comment.author: 35014516@N03
comment._content: Wystan:  Thanks for Dr. Miller's first name here.  We'll add it to the record (and include Roosevelt's name) next time we update.

comment.author: 70251312@N00
comment._content: Anne, his name as spelt by Bain is Muller, not Miller. It probably was Mueller, actually -- originally with an umlaut.
